Body: My old phone Motorola Defy had the option by calling to search for a contact just typing a number. Not sure how that feature is called but I'll give an example:If I want to call "Alex" i need to press 2(a bc) 5(jk l) 3(d e f) 9(w x yz) and I press the call button.Now I got the Nexus 4 and there is not such a feature, which is really annoying. Is there a custom dialer that support this feature? Or is it possible to enable it from somewhere?
Title: search somebody from contacts with the numpads

history.Text: My old phone Motorola Defy had the option by calling to search for a contact just typing a number. Not sure how that feature is called but I'll give an example:If I want to call "Alex" i need to press 2(**a** bc) 5(jk **l**) 3(d **e** f) 9(w **x** yz) and I press the call button.Now I got the Nexus 4 and there is not such a feature, which is really annoying. Is there a custom dialer that support this feature? Or is it possible to enable it from somewhere?
